tags.name: for-loop
tags.description: HTTL-S: Iterates over an array and renders content for each item. Use ${valueVar} and ${indexVar} inside template to access current item/index.

attributes.name: array
attributes.description: Array variable name to iterate over

attributes.name: valueVar
attributes.description: Variable name for current item (default: 'value'). Access with ${valueVar}

attributes.name: indexVar
attributes.description: Variable name for current index (default: 'index'). Access with ${indexVar}

attributes.name: loopid
attributes.description: Unique identifier - must match the template's loopid attribute

attributes.name: start
attributes.description: Start index (default: 0)

attributes.name: end
attributes.description: End index (default: array.length)

attributes.name: step
attributes.description: Step increment (default: 1)

tags.name: condition-block
tags.description: HTTL-S: Container for conditional if-else rendering. Must contain a template with matching ifid.

attributes.name: ifid
attributes.description: Unique identifier - must match the template's ifid attribute

tags.name: if-condition
tags.description: HTTL-S: Conditional element. Renders content if condition is true. Operators: eq (===), neq (!==), gt (>), lt (<), gte (>=), lte (<=). If no operator, checks truthiness.

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: JavaScript expression to evaluate

attributes.name: eq
attributes.description: Equals comparison (===)

attributes.name: neq
attributes.description: Not equals comparison (!==)

attributes.name: gt
attributes.description: Greater than comparison (>)

attributes.name: lt
attributes.description: Less than comparison (<)

attributes.name: gte
attributes.description: Greater than or equal (>=)

attributes.name: lte
attributes.description: Less than or equal (<=)

attributes.name: elseid
attributes.description: ID linking to corresponding else-condition element

tags.name: else-condition
tags.description: HTTL-S: Else block for if-condition. Renders when corresponding if-condition is false.

attributes.name: elseid
attributes.description: Must match the elseid of the corresponding if-condition

tags.name: state-element
tags.description: HTTL-S: Simple reactive element for displaying state values. Use {{expression}} inside template.

attributes.name: stateId
attributes.description: Unique identifier - must match the template's stateId attribute

tags.name: include-template
tags.description: HTTL-S: Includes external HTML file as a component. CSS is scoped by default using Shadow DOM.

attributes.name: file
attributes.description: Relative path to the HTML file to include

attributes.name: scoped
attributes.description: CSS isolation mode. 'true' (default): Shadow DOM scoped styles. 'false': global styles.

globalAttributes.name: data-loop
globalAttributes.description: HTTL-S: Array name for data-loop iteration (use with data-template, data-value, data-index)

globalAttributes.name: data-template
globalAttributes.description: HTTL-S: CSS selector for template element (e.g., #myTemplate)

globalAttributes.name: data-value
globalAttributes.description: HTTL-S: Variable name for current item in data-loop

globalAttributes.name: data-index
globalAttributes.description: HTTL-S: Variable name for current index in data-loop

globalAttributes.name: data-innerhtml
globalAttributes.description: HTTL-S: JavaScript expression to evaluate and set as innerHTML

globalAttributes.name: data-js
globalAttributes.description: HTTL-S: JavaScript code to execute on setState. Use 'this' to reference the element.
